title: POLY-PTX SuperPolish polishing sleeve
description:
Revolutionary special fleece. In combination with polishing pastes and creams, achieves a brilliant mirror shine on VA and non-ferrous metals without streaks and shadows.

Features:
- Ideal for use with polishing machines and hand-held longitudinal sanders
- Dimensions: 90 x 100 mm, 90 x 50 mm
- Ideal speed: 1,000–3,000 min⁻¹
- Maximum speed: 5,000 min⁻¹
- Only to be used with a suitable expansion roller
- Note: Always use an extra SuperPolish sleeve for each paste/cream so as not to mix different grain sizes
